'''"Wisdom of the Forbidden Fortress"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Wisdom of the Forbidden Fortress" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest after completing a [[Time Trial Challenge]] in the west [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]].
